description:
Like peanut butter or salsa, people like different things. This chalk has a super-chunky texture so you crush it between your fingers before you set off with purpose.

  • Now shipping in fully recyclable packaging, your favourite chalk now has a smaller footprint
  • Contains pure chalk with no potentially harmful drying agents or impurities
  • Won't overdry your skin, and protects it from drying out or cracking
name: Friction Labs Bam Bam Chalk 340g
